text: The Prime Minister of Aruba is de facto head of the Executive branch of government. Together with Aruba's Council of Ministers, they form the executive branch of Aruban government. ==List of Prime Ministers of Aruba== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- ! colspan=2|No. ! width=100px|Portrait ! title: Prime Minister of Aruba
